postlist.title: github commit
postlist.content:
$git clone (link) $git init $git add . $git commit -m “origin file” 可简写为: git commit -am ‘说明’ $git push origin master or

git push

)

git status (状态) touch .gitignore (创建gitcommit忽略配置)
postlist.text: $git clone (link) $git init $git add . $git commit -m “origin file” 可简写为: git commit -am ‘说明’ $git push origin master orgit push)git status
